title: The Epicenter of Luxury and Convenience.
posting_body: ['Welcome to gracious living in the grand European tradition in the heart of upbeat, downtown Los Angeles, offering skyline views of one of Americas most dynamic cities.', 'Eleven distinctive floor plans that were creatively designed and crafted with a wealth of detail giving you the perfect setting for your luxurious California lifestyle.', 'AMENITIES AND FEATURES', "-Three Cybex Elliptical Machines with Individual Flat-Screen TV's", '-Full Size Washer and Dryer', '-Pilates Equipment', '-Amazing City Views from Sundeck', '-24-Hour State-of-the-Art Fitness Center', '-Conference/Board Room for Meetings (Seats 8 Comfortably)', '-Large Picture Windows', '-Outdoor', 'Shower to Rinse Off', '-Junior Olympic-Size Swimming Pool', '-Beautiful Panoramic City Views from Many Vantage Points', '-Spectacular Two-Story Entry Lobby', '-Crown Moldings', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'WEBSITE', '<URL>', 'ADDRESS', '1221 W. 3rd St., Los Angeles, CA 90017', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.']
